verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa-varṇa-śabdera artha dui ta pramāṇa
kṛṣṇa vinu tāṅra mukhe nāhi āise āna

synonyms: kṛṣṇa-varṇa-śabdera—of the word kṛṣṇa-varṇa; artha—the meaning; dui—two; ta—certainly; pramāṇa—examples; kṛṣṇa—Kṛṣṇa; vinu—except for; tāṅra—of Him; mukhe—in the mouth; nāhi āise—does not come; āna—anything else.
translation: These are two meanings of the word "kṛṣṇa-varṇa." Indeed, nothing else but Kṛṣṇa issues from His mouth.
